channel.title: CVE Feed for Creative Motion -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Creative Motion -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-34806|2024-08-02T02:59:22.650Z -- creative%20motion -- clearfy%20cache
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Creative Motion Clearfy Cache.This issue affects Clearfy Cache: from n/a through 2.2.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-33629|2024-08-02T02:36:04.311Z -- creative%20motion -- auto%20featured%20image%20%28auto%20post%20thumbnail%29
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Creative Motion Auto Featured Image (Auto Post Thumbnail).This issue affects Auto Featured Image (Auto Post Thumbnail): from n/a through 4.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-7073|2024-06-04T17:17:25.767Z -- creative%20motion -- auto%20featured%20image%20%28auto%20post%20thumbnail%29
item.description: The Auto Featured Image (Auto Post Thumbnail) plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Server-Side Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 4.0.0 via the upload_to_library AJAX action. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with author-level access and above, to make web requests to arbitrary locations originating from the web application and can be used to query and modify information from internal services.

item.title: CVE-2024-33629|2024-04-29T07:43:40.108Z -- creative%20motion -- auto%20featured%20image%20%28auto%20post%20thumbnail%29
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Creative Motion Auto Featured Image (Auto Post Thumbnail).This issue affects Auto Featured Image (Auto Post Thumbnail): from n/a through 4.0.0.

item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Creative Motion Clearfy Cache.This issue affects Clearfy Cache: from n/a through 2.2.1.
